transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Adab sir, very good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Yes sir, tumcha baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye madam.
Executive: Empower.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha, maine isliye call kiya hai sir ki abhi aapko further jo ek tarike se bataya hai, usme kabhi koi issue to nahi aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi issue to nahi hai, lekin enquiry bahut chhote mote aa rahe hai.
Executive: Chhote mote aa rahe hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai, jaise ki sir abhi ek ye, ye diesel generator ke liye Chandrashekhar naam hai, Dharwad se enquiry aapko aayi thi, 28 November kal ki date me.
Customer: Bahut chhote enquiry pe baat ho payega.
Executive: Wo chhota hai madam wo Dharwad ka.
Executive: Achha Dharwad ka chhota hai, thik hai, hamara starting range hi 10 KVA ke above hai madam, jo bhi aa rahe hai 5 se 7.
Executive: Achha thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai, mai just dekh rahi hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi ek Dharwad ka aaya hai Chandrashekhar bolke, uska dekho madam 7.5 hai.
Executive: Ha 7.5 ki hai.
Customer: Hmm, fir bhi bheja hu mai, uska jawab nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay, usse 7.5 se bhi 10 KVA denge kya bolke mai, but unka reply nahi aaya, to hamara basic kya hai starting range 10 se upar hai madam.
Executive: Okay, okay thik hai, to sir iske liye na jaise aapne bataya abhi aapka starting range hi.
Executive: Kitna minimum kitna hai sir?
Customer: 10 KVA.
Executive: 10 KVA.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay, to sir jaise aapne minimum starting me mujhe bataya ki 10 KVA hai, to yaha pe just mai ek bar check kar leti hu, sir abhi iske liye aapko ek bar baat karna chah rahe the, to maine kaha ki thik hai ek bar mai pehle aapse puch leti hu ki abhi further aapke paas time hai ya nahi, fir mai aage discuss karu.
Customer: Hmm, boliye madam.
Executive: Kyuki aapka jo product range hai na sir, already dekhiye isme aisa hai ki apna 1 lakh se upar hi sabka order value hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo bhi hamara product hai, to ab aap yaha pe ha, matlab 1 lakh above hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ab yaha pe aap jitne maan lijiye pura agar Karnataka bhi aap deal kar rahe hai na, aapka waise to Karnataka ye Karnataka aur Goa, matlab pura Goa aur Karnataka deal kare right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab in location me, ha in do location me bhi mai check kar rahi thi ki kaha pe kya ho sakta hai, iske liye maine sir se discuss bhi kiya tha ki aapka minimum order value itna rahega location ke wise, to unhone just ek bar kaha tha ki wo meeting me aapse discuss karna chahte hai, aap mere ko ek time de sakte hai sir, agar aaj possible hai to, nahi to kal ke liye ya fir Tuesday.
Customer: Thik hai discuss karna madam.
Executive: Mai wahi matlab sir matlab baat karenge sir kyuki aapke product line ko dekhe sir mujhe bhi utna jyada nahi, mujhe jo cheeze pata thi ki agar aap is tarike se karte hai to kafi achhi aapko yaha pe lead mil sakti hai, but further unhone ye dekha ki isme aur hum kya better kar sakte hai, to sir uske liye sir wahi discuss kar payenge.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Kya hai bahut chhote aa rahe hai madam enquiry sab 5 KVA, 5 KVA.
Executive: Ha wo 5 KVA ka mai wahi dekh rahi hu chhote bahut jyada chhote order hai, aur agar jo bade order aa rahe hai to wo different different state me hai.
Customer: Hmm ab wo 10 above to aise 20, 30, 125 aisa aayega to thoda.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jaise sir 25 abhi KVA ka dikh raha hai ye MP ka hai, MP me hum deal nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Ek abhi aapki lead hai.
Executive: 25 KVA ki hai sir diesel generator ki, ye 26 minute pehle aayi hai, ek bar aap bylist pe jayenge.
Customer: Kidhar?
Executive: Bylist wale page pe jayenge sir.
Customer: Bylist pe hi hu mai.
Executive: Ha bylist me thoda sa scroll down karke niche ki taraf dekhenge.
Customer: 25 ka kidhar hai madam kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm so West Bengal hai, Jammu Kashmir hai, Manipur.
Executive: 25 KVA ki hai diesel engine generator set ki hai, thik hai, single phase me hi manga hai.
Customer: Ye Uttar Pradesh hai madam wo.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Uttar Pradesh hai wo.
Executive: Sir Uttar Pradesh ki lead hai, madhya, madhya ye jo mai bata rahi hu, Mandsaur Madhya Pradesh ki lead hai ye.
Customer: Hmm Mathura.
Executive: MP ki lead hai, to wahi, wahi mai keh rahi hu na ki MP to different state ho gaya, agar kar sakte to better hai nahi kar sakte to.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Siway Karnataka Goa chhod ke mai kidhar bhi nahi karunga madam.
Executive: Mai Karnataka ki ek bar check karti hu.
Customer: Mai jata bhi nahi madam wo sabhi, even Maharashtra bhi nahi dekhta mai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Karnataka Karnataka location me only 7.5 KVA ki hai, 1 KVA ki hai, 5 KVA, 5 KVA.
Customer: Wahi mera range hi nahi hai.
Executive: Ha ji aapka range hi nahi hai, minimum 10 KVA se aapka range start ho raha hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Belgaum se ek ye bhi 10 KVA ki ek 6 minute pehle ki dekhiye, but inhone to mention kiya diesel engine generator set ki 10 KVA, abhi 6 minute pehle ki hai, but ye Pune ki hai, Pune me kar nahi sakte hum.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Isiliye ek do teen din se kuch bhi enquiries nahi hai, only chhote mote hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Dekho madam kuch kar sakte hai kya?
Executive: Ji mai wahi keh rahi hu ek bar agar aap ek bar aap time de to mai sir ke sath meeting aapki fix karau kyuki sir wo sabse hai ki wo aapko thoda better guide kar payenge, isme aapko aur.
Customer: Nahi wo kya kar sakte hai, wo kya kar sakte hai?
Executive: Sir wo aapko aur thoda better guide karenge ki isme hum aur kya additional cheeze kar sakte hai, agar aapke buyer jo aa rahe hai na, buyer aa rahe hai kya market me competitor chal rahe hai, aapke catalog me aur agar kuch bacha hoga, to sir is tarike se mai abhi aapse baat kar rahi hu, maine aapka jitna catalog analysis kiya hai, wo sari cheeze aapko bataiye, further agar result nahi aa raha hai sir to mai to apni senior se already discuss karungi.
Customer: Ye hafta kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Ye hafta kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Ye hafta kuch bhi nahi hai madam result mera, sab chhote mote hi hai, sab chhote mote hi hai ye hafta.
Executive: Exactly, exactly sir sare chhote mote hi aa rahe hai, fir chhote mote agar aa rahi hai iska kya raaz dene aur hum itni badi meeting kyu kar rahe hai, aur aise nahi ki lead aapki show nahi hai, abhi isme jaise mai dekh rahi hu diesel generator 30 KVA ki aayi thi, jo sold out ho chuki hai ye aapki Sangli ki thi Maharashtra ki, Karnataka ki aayi hai 82.5.
Customer: Sangli nahi.
Customer: Sangli wo nahi mai mai dekha tha wo lekin.
Executive: Sangli nahi Belgaum to hai na sir Karnataka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Belgaum ki aayi thi 82.5 me, to 82.5 ke liye sir.
Customer: Wo sab wo sab kya chhota madam purane jo bhi hai jitne bhi hai kiya wo.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ye sab aap jo bol rahe hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Everything is done.
Customer: Lekin kya hai wo iske nahi aa rahe madam, hamare area ke.
Executive: Aapke area ke sir mai wahi keh rahi hu Karnataka ki lead to available hai sir, ek bar mai just ye keh rahi thi agar aap mere ko time de sir abhi ke liye possible hai, ya Monday, Monday nahi Tuesday ke liye.
Customer: Hmm Tuesday ko dal do madam kya hai discuss karenge.
Executive: Hmm, sir mai wahi keh rahi hu na dekhiye sir actually ek bar senior se call isliye le jana better hota hai kyuki mere senior hai, thik hai, wo aapko waha pe ho sakta hai ki kuch kyuki unko bhi sir 8 saal ka experience hai is field me, un yaha pe aur kya better kar sakte hai business growth ke liye, to wo aapko jyada acche se suggest kar payenge, ki agar aap is tarike se karte hai to ho sakta hai ki apni lead yaha pe convert ho, hame buyer milna shuru ho.
Customer: Thik hai madam kar do okay.
Executive: Thik hai, ek bar mai just Tuesday ko aapki baat karati hu, us time pe hum discuss kar lenge sir aur please aapki jo query hogi please aap puch lijiyega, maine waise to sir ko bata rakha hai aapka Karnataka aur Goa yahi do main location hai jaha pe aap deal karna chah rahe hai, aur jaha pe hame focus karna chahiye, correct?
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Ha, baki buyer ki calls bhi yahi hai ki aapko che call aayi hai jisme se aapne sirf ek call miss ki puri answer ki hai, abhi aap further desktop se hi lead ko consume kar rahe hai.
Customer: Thik hai lo madam okay.
Executive: Thik hai mai Tuesday ko sir connect karti hu.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiries are very small.

- Starting range is 10 KVA, leads are below.

- Wants leads from Karnataka and Goa only.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of senior executive.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled with senior executive on Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, kva range, location, meeting
